title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Exploring Ethical Issues in Recommendation Systems: A Q-Methodology-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Participants can systematically classify diverse perspectives on ethical issues in recommendation systems (data security, algorithmic bias) using Q-methodology
Participants can analyze the social impacts of recommendation systems (information bias, monopoly issues) through mathematical modeling and design ethical frameworks
Learners can complete project-based team assignments (ethical guideline development) using collaboration tools in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
